body.name: IAPOS Portable Charger 40000mah Power Bank, USB-C (22.5W) Fast Charging Battery Pack Cell Phone Charger for iPhone 15/14/13 Series, Android Samsung Galaxy, Laptop, for Travel Camping - Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 21 hrs 14 mins
features: [22.5W Fast Charging Power Bank, 4.5 Times Faster]: IAPOS portable phone charger offers an astounding 22.5W fast charging speed and 18W fast recharging speed, making it 4.5 times faster than conventional phone chargers, maximizing efficiency and productivity.

[Triple-Port & Omnipotent Compatibility]: IAPOS battery pack charger comes with 2 USB-A (22.5W output) ports and 1 USB-C (18W input/22W output) port, allowing for simultaneous charging of up to three devices. IAPOS portable battery charger widely compatible with iPhone 15/15 Plus/15 Pro/15 Pro Max/iPhone14/13/12/11/Samsung Galaxy/Google Pixel and more Android phones/laptop and other electronic devices.

[Large Power Bank Capacity with Compact Design]: 40,000mAh battery bank capacity compressed into a compact body and weighing only 15oz. Whether you're camping traveling or even in the event of a power outage at home, the IAPOS 40,000mAh portable power bank ensures you always have reliable power!

[Unique Touch Control & Real-Time Power Monitoring]: IAPOS cell phone charger is equipped with both a high-precision intelligent LED digital display and a one-of-a-kind touch design that accurately reflects the remaining battery percentage at the touch of the button, ensuring you are always in control.*(Note: The buttons of powerbank are for monitoring the remaining power in standby mode only)

[Comfortable Touch Experience]: IAPOS portable battery charger features an exquisite grain design that not only enhances aesthetics but also provides an unparalleled tactile experience and non-slip grip.

[Fortress-Like Security]: IAPOS phone battery bank has implemented state-of-the-art security protocols, including overcharge, overcurrent, and short-circuit protection. Your device is cocooned in safety while you indulge in effortless charging luxury.

Q&A Q1: How the touch buttons work？A1:The buttons of power bank are for monitoring the remaining power in standby mode only(Touch once to display the remaining battery and then automatically rest the screen after 10 seconds. ** Touch twice has no function)Q2: Why doesn't my power bank show fast charging symbol?A2: First, make sure your electronic devices, charging cables, and adapters support fast charging. and when your electronic device being charged reaches a sufficient level of power, the portable charger will enter the "Device Protection" state and the "Fast" symbol will no longer be displayed.Q3: My portable charger doesn't workA3: Drain the remaining power of the rechargeable battery, then fully charge it for 24 hours. Or address the after-sales team, we are committed to solving any problem you may have!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Powerhouse on the Go: A Must-Have Portable Charger!
reviews.reviewText: This 40000mAh Portable Charger is a game-changer for on-the-go charging, delivering a powerhouse performance in a compact design.**Capacity: ⚡️⚡️⚡️⚡️⚡️ (5/5)**With its massive 40000mAh capacity, this charger ensures all-day power for multiple devices, eliminating the need for constant recharging.**Versatile Charging: ⚙️⚙️⚙️⚙️⚙️ (5/5)**Featuring 1 USB-C and 2 USB-A outputs, including 22.5W fast charging, it's a versatile solution for simultaneous and rapid charging of various devices.**Design and Portability: 🎨🎨🎨🎨🎨 (5/5)**Its sleek, durable design, and LED indicators make it a pocket-friendly, reliable companion for all your charging needs.**Conclusion: 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 (5/5)**This Portable Charger is a must-have, combining exceptional capacity, versatile charging options, and broad device compatibility in a sleek, pocket-sized package. A highly recommended charging marvel for any lifestyle!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Large Charge, Not Too Heavy or Bulky
reviews.reviewText: I really like this charger! I was recently traveling in Europe for 3 weeks and borrowed my father-in-law’s very small power bank. It was small and didn’t weigh much, which made it convenient to use in a variety of circumstances. However, I realized that for future trips I really needed something larger. I am often out for long days at a time, hiking in nature, or on the road exploring, and I want to keep my devices charged for taking pictures and video or using it for navigation. I began to try several ones, and this one is the BEST out of all I have tried. While this one is about 15 ounces in weight it will charge my iPhone at least 4-5x in total before I need to recharge it, which I doubt I will ever need.I really like the circular digital readout that tells how much charge is left. I can just tap the side button, without needing to plug it in, and know immediately. It is easy to read and so far I haven’t drained it to zero. It also charges quite quick and charges my iPhone quick. I also love that it has the option for USB-C, which offers a lot of options for different devices, and sort of “future-proofs” this portable charger. It was a good price, and one of the better deals I found while researching.So far this purchase is better than I expected and was everything I wanted in upgrading. I’ll update this review if that changes in the future, but I don’t expect it to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great portable charger
reviews.reviewText: I have a smaller portable charger from this company, and it is great; I just received this bigger charger and it is also great! It charges devices fast and lasts a long time on a single charge. I charged my phone from 15% to 85% on my lunch break at work (half an hour). I also used the same charge to charge my phone overnight and my son's tablet when we went out: it still has more charge left to give.The only drawback is how bulky and heavy it is. Carrying this in your pocket or small purse would be annoying I would think. But that's so small of an issue compared to how nice this charges and how long it lasts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Portable Charger
reviews.reviewText: This is the best portable charger I've ever used! I have had so many chargers from the cheapest ones that take hours to charge your phone, to solar chargers and this is hands down the best one!It fast charges your phone so you don't have to wait too long for it to go from 0%-100%.It's heavy and solid so you can feel it's a good charger.I accidentally dropped it right after opening it 🤦🏻‍♀️ and was afraid I broke it, but it didn't even have a scratch on it! And it still works perfectly fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My charger came fully charged so I went ahead and took the challenge plugged it up to my iPhone and it was charged in nine minutes from 29%. Also I have taken it to work and tried different cords to different phones and computer and it charges all of them really well, it’s very affordable didn’t cost much at all it’s energy efficient. The battery life is amazing it’s still at 91% from 11 o’clock this morning when I unplugged it it is heavy and large but that’s because it’s a real deal and if you drop it, you don’t have to worry about it breaking because it’s made like a truck , I really like this product. My dad has an old farm truck and it doesn’t have anywhere to charge your phone so this is perfect. I actually ordered him one as well. I really appreciate you telling me about the item. It was worth every bit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very solid, with great capacity - readout is very helpful
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this companies 20,000 mAh a few months ago and liked it so much that when I found out they had another version with twice the capacity, I was comfortable buying it from them. It has a very solid build quality and while I don't plan to drop it, it feels like what ever it lands on will suffer more than this battery. This battery has 2 standard USB-A and one USB-C outlets and charges quickly. I like having a portable battery with the capacity to charge my iPad when traveling. Super helpful to have a display providing the charge status of the battery itself. I recommend this battery for anyone looking for a solid, well built travel battery. I also recommend their 20,000 mAh battery if you need a smaller battery that is the size of a cell phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great portable charger
reviews.reviewText: You can charge 2 devices at a time. Charges fast. It's 40,000mAh. Happy with my purchase so far. It is a little heavier than the 10,000mAh. But if you need to charge multiple devices it is worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality Construction, Fit for Purpose
reviews.reviewText: Purchased smaller unit by this company a few months ago and found it to be solid quality and dependable power supply. As a result, I bought this larger, more powerful unit. It is, as expected, considerably heavier; but, still solid and well designed. I use it as a power source for always-on-display of GPS, tracker, cellphone, lights and other electronics as I ride my bike for hours at a time [so the weight is of no meaningful consequence]. Well-packaged [although it seemed strange that the disposal instructions on the box were only in French]. The Seller was extremely responsive to pre-purchase questions, which I find to building confidence when making purchases.
